key.name: question2
key.value: <font color='Red'>*</font> What symptoms did you notice that led you to submit this support request?

key.name: question3
key.value: What is the exact text of any error messages that you received that are associated with this problem?

key.name: question4
key.value: What is occurring and what do you expect to be occurring?

key.name: question5
key.value: What system and version are you using when the problem occurs?

key.name: question6
key.value:
Are there any online articles that match the problem, even if the solution is not working?
(Include links to the articles.)

key.name: pdesc
